title: Splunk security advisory (AV25-313)
description: On June 2, 2025, Splunk published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Splunk Enterprise  versions prior to 9.4.2, 9.3.4, 9.2.6 and 9.1.9
Splunk Universal Forwarder  versions prior to 9.4.2, 9.3.4, 9.2.6 and 9.1.9
Splunk Universal Forwarder for Windows  versions prior to 9.4.2, 9.3.4, 9.2.6 and 9.1.9
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
